task.voice_en: Our 3D vision camera uses our own low-cost, high-reliability flexible MOEMS optoelectronic scanning technology. This technology is like equipping the robot's eyes with super flexible eyeballs, which can increase the speckle quantity in binocular vision by more than 5 times without increasing the total optical power, while ensuring human eye safety. This significantly improves the detection accuracy of the binocular vision system by more than double. Moreover, our camera has also broken through the technical bottlenecks of traditional binocular vision in fine tasks, offering a cost-effective solution. This means our robots can see more clearly and accurately in various scenarios, whether it's bright daylight or dim nighttime, and accomplish more delicate tasks
task.voice: 我们的3D视觉相机使用了自主研发的低成本、高可靠的柔性MOEMS光电扫描技术。这个技术就像是给机器人的眼睛装上了超级灵活的眼球，能够在保证人眼安全的同时，不增加总光功率，让双目视觉中的散斑数量提高5倍以上，这样就能大幅提高双目视觉系统的检测精度两倍以上。 而且，我们的相机还突破了传统双目视觉在精细任务中的技术瓶颈，提供了一个性价比极高的解决方案。这意味着我们的机器人能够在各种使用场景中， 无论是在明亮的白天还是在昏暗的夜晚，都能看得更清楚、更准确，完成更多精细的任务
